segments.text: I'm watching the boy on that stool, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on reaching those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks like it's about to collapse at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, tilted at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, his little body is almost horizontal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder he hasn't tumbled off already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, hand outstretched, just waiting for him to succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really are a team, even if it's for a forbidden snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman is still polishing her plate, utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is still overflowing, water covering the floor around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly frustrating to see such an imminent accident ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to intervene before he crashes down with a plate of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine the mess and the crying that will follow.
segments.speaker: PAR
